//1: describes your app and its dependencies
//3: updating this file will download and update your packages
name: my-glitch-app

scripts.start: budo modules/client.js --dir views --dir public --dir external --title a-frame-node-default-glitch --verbose --poll 31536000 --port $PORT -- -t brfs
scripts.budo: budo modules/client.js --dir views --dir public --dir external --title a-frame-node-default-glitch --verbose --port 3000 --open -- -t brfs -p browserify-hmr
scripts.temp: budo modules/client.js --dir views --dir public --dir external --title a-frame-node-default-glitch --verbose --port 3000 --open -- -t brfs -p browserify-hmr
scripts.sleepy: budo modules/client.js --dir views --dir public --dir external --title a-frame-node-default-glitch --verbose --poll 31536000 --port 3000 --open -- -t brfs
